page.title: 19S.W.GUILDFORD: ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The Civic Hall is a major centre for entertainment in Guildford. It hosts a variety of events including live concerts and discos, these appeal especially to the young. The Guildford Philharmonic Orchestra also uses the Civic Hall for regular concerts. There are two theatres in Guildford, the Bellerby and the Yvonne Arnaud. The Bellerby produces amateur plays, and drama and dance activities, whereas the Yvonne Arnaud produces amateur and professional performances which sometimes feature well-known personalities. Guildford has two cinemas, The Odeon and Studio One And Two. A bingo hall is situated just outside the town centre and is very popular, as is Cinderella Rockafellas nightclub.{By Sian Davies,Hana Canter {Carolyn Buss and Sarah Sherrington
